snippet: Jack Taylor, who set the N.C.A.A. scoring record with 138 points in a game in November for Grinnell College, is out for the season after breaking his wrist.
abstract: Grinnell guard Jack Taylor, who set the NCAA scoring record with 138 points in a game in November, will miss rest of season with broken wrist; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Jack Taylor, who set the N.C.A.A. scoring record with 138 points in a game in November for Grinnell College, is out for the season after breaking his wrist.

headline.seo: 138-Point Scorer Jack Taylor Is Out for the Season
headline.main: 138-Point Scorer in College Basketball Is Lost for Season
